MODULE.name: VOICE_MODULE_VPECNS
MODULE.description:
Dual-mic Voice Plus ECNS in the voice processor on the Tx#[ #] path.
This module supports the following parameter IDs:
VOICE_PARAM_MOD_ENABLE
VOICE_PARAM_VPECNS

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: Enable
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Enables/disables this feature

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: Reserved
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Client should set this field to zero.

PARAMETER.name: VOICE_PARAM_VPECNS
PARAMETER.description:
Voice Plus dual-mic ECNS.
Maximum array size for this parameter
Version#[ #] 0 â€“ 80 bytes

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: reserved
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Client must set this field to zero.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: Mode
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Mode word to enable/disable sub-modules in the algorithm

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: Mode2
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Additional mode word for advanced options

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: EC_path_delay
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Acoustic echo#[ #] path delay compensation

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: LEC1_taps
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Number of taps for LEC1 (mic1)

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: LEC1_el_rate
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Learning rate for LEC1

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: LEC2_taps
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Number of taps for LEC2 (mic2)

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: LEC2_el_rate
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Learning rate for LEC2

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: PP_ecAlphar
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Echo suppression based on decay rate of estimated echo tail

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: PP_ecCompy
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Echo suppression based on power of the estimated echo tail

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: PP_ecFarGamma
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Echo suppression aggressiveness during far-end speech

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: PP_ecNearGamma
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Echo suppression aggressiveness during near-end speech

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: PP_nsGamma_SN
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Stationary noise suppression aggressiveness

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: PP_nsGamma_NN
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Non-stationary noise suppression aggressiveness

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: PP_nsGain_SN
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Maximum amount of stationary noise suppression

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: PP_nsGain_NN
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Maximum amount of non-stationary noise suppression

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: PP_nsGamma_bias
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Bias compensation to balance stationary and non-stationary noise suppression

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: SF_vad_thresh
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Voice activity detection threshold for spatial filter

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: Gain_mic1
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Input gain for mic 1

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: Gain_mic2
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Input gain for mic 2

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: PP_WB_ecFarGamma
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Echo suppression aggressiveness for high-band (4-8kHz)

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: PP_WB_nsGamma_SN
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Stationary noise suppression aggressiveness for high band (4-8kHz)

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: PP_WB_nsGamma_NN
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Non-stationary noise suppression aggressiveness for high band (4-8kHz)

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: PP_nsref_factor
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Noise reference over-estimation

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: Gain_out
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Output gain

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: Gain_agm
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Over-estimation of noise mic signal before spatial filter

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: PP_nlec_gamma
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Non-linear echo suppression aggressiveness

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: PP_ec_cni_level
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Comfort noise injection level

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: PP_ecDTGamma
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Echo suppression aggressiveness during double-talk

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: NS_clean_thresh
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Clean speech detection threshold

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: Mode3
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Additional mode word for advanced options

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: Gain_postLEC_mic1
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: LEC 1 post gain (before noise suppression)

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: Gain_postLEC_mic2
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: LEC 2 post gain (before noise suppression)

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: PP_Clean_nsGamma_SN
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Stationary noise suppression aggressiveness when clean speech is detected

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: PP_Clean_nsGamma_NN
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Non-Stationary noise suppression aggressiveness when clean speech is detected

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: LEC_HB_taps
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Number of taps for high band LEC

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: LEC_HB_el_rate
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: High band LEC learning rate

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: PP_WB_ecAlphar
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Echo suppression based on decay rate of estimated echo tail for high band (4-8kHz)

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: PP_WB_ecCompy
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Echo suppression based on power of the estimated echo tail for high band (4-8kHz)
